introduction: Chao Sarah (1993) opens with Audry Gutiérrez Alea, Titón's daughter, using a banana as a dildo. The short is part of a double experiment of which only half was filmed. Marzel wrote two scripts: an original and its parody, but only wanted to make the latter. Therefore, we are witnessing a reference without a reference, which involves the most absurd series of dialogues and monologues of which the national cinema has memory.
